Articles.Content: While sitting in a Physical Therapy rehab facility...for a couple of weeks...I concocted the notion of a Proving Ground on a plain of Duna. But what to test? ICBMs was the answer...of course.  After hours of trial & error...plus 8 or 9  "easing in" operations...Duna Proving Ground officially opened for business. To capture photographic data...the Kerbals at  Weaver Consolidated Industries (Weav-Con) developed a Multi-Instrument Camera Rig . The rig has 4 Webb Telescopes mounted on it...and it will swivel 360 degrees.  Among the systems tested at the Proving grounds are the "Fast Eddie ICBM Refurb System"...a joint venture with RSR. The second image shows the successful launch of a refurbed Minuteman V ICBM.
